title: Are universities making the world worse? Education and research in an age of climate change
arranger: Uppsala universitet, Centrum för hållbar utveckling (CEMUS) vid Uppsala universitet och SLU
description: What is the role of universities in response to the great environmental and social challenges of our times? In an age of escalating climate change, ecological unravelling and societal instability and uncertainty, what is higher education and research really for? And for whom?
